Detailed Description

Node of the BSP tree.

This class implements a node from the bsp tree. If it is a leaf node, then it defines a convex volume in 3D space. The class members are: pointers to children nodes, an array of flyBspObjects that clip the volume, an array of neighbouring nodes, the position of the center of the node and the node's natural ambient light color.
